Package com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options

Interface OptionIterableBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder, EnumOptionIterableBuilder, FixedOptionIterableBuilder
public interface OptionIterableBuilder
Interface for delegating building of OptionFormElementBuilder items until a ViewElementBuilderContext is available. Responsible for creating an Iterable.

Implementations should set the OptionFormElementBuilder.rawValue(Object) if they want auto-selection of options to work.

Author:
Arne Vandamme
See Also:
